name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForPercutaneousCoronaryInterventionPCI
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to percutaneous coronary intervention or coronary angioplasty.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ballon angioplasty, rotational atherectomy and angioplasty with stent placement.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
